title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content (HTML text within <html> tags, HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and text with RTF tags), the dynamic text element does not apply the appropriate content type.
OB: The dynamic text element does not apply the appropriate content type to the displayed text.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a database field with three types of content:
   a) HTML text within <html> tags
   b) HTML fragments not within <html> tags
   c) Text with RTF tags
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Verify that the dynamic text element does not apply the appropriate content type to the displayed text.
